job description: MULTIPLE POSITIONS AVAILABLE: Participate in the design, development, evaluation, deployment and updating of data-driven models and analytical solutions for machine learning and/or natural language applications. Develop and/or apply statistical modeling techniques (e.g. Bayesian models and deep neural networks), optimization methods, and other ML techniques to different applications in business and engineering. Routinely build and deploy ML models on available data. Research and implement novel ML and statistical approaches to add value to the business. Mentor junior engineers and scientists.
